rows.label: tlk70000060_05_msg0001
rows.name:
*Sniff...sob...*
Dad said he didn't want my help...

rows.label: tlk70000060_05_msg0002
rows.name:
He's not saying it to be mean, I know...
But it still hurts...

rows.label: tlk70000060_05_msg0003
rows.name:
I want to tell him how I'm feeling,
really I do, but I just sort of clam up
whenever Kaede's around...

rows.label: tlk70000060_05_msg0004
rows.name:
Ohhh, why is this all so hard?
I don't know what to do anymore...
